sentences.en: A gymnast requires willpower and determination, intelligence and creative expression of feelings.
sentences.cn: 一名体操运动员要有坚强意志,勇敢顽强, 机智灵敏和有创造性地表现自己的情感.

sentences.en: But us find there are certain memories that we can't get rid of with willpower alone.
sentences.cn: 但是我们发现有些记忆不是单凭意志就可以抹去的.

sentences.en: Finally, relying on willpower, big S has finally gone through valleys.
sentences.cn: 最后, 靠着意志力, 大S终于走过幽谷.

sentences.en: Grit goes beyond willpower, but willpower is a necessary component of grit.
sentences.cn: 坚毅比意志力含义更深远, 所以意志力是坚毅的一部分.

sentences.en: He hasn't the willpower to stop eating so much.
sentences.cn: 他缺乏意志力,克制不住自己的贪吃.

sentences.en: I know I've got the willpower to do it.
sentences.cn: 我知道我有毅力做这事儿。

sentences.en: Iron Will > 1 point bonus to your Willpower attribute per skill level.
sentences.cn: 钢铁意志》每技能等级增加1点意志属性加成.

sentences.en: It took all his willpower to remain calm.
sentences.cn: 他竭尽全力才保持了镇定。

sentences.en: M: She must have willpower, determination, intelligence and creative expression of feelings.
sentences.cn: 她一定具有坚强意志 、 决心 、 机智灵敏和对情感的创造性表达.

sentences.en: Objective To make a willpower questionnaire for middle - high school students.
sentences.cn: 目的编制适合中学生使用的意志力问卷.

sentences.en: She managed to stop smoking by sheer willpower.
Stones whet a sword, difficulties strengthen willpower.
sentences.cn: 石头是刀的朋友, 障碍是意志的朋友.

sentences.en: The amount of damage depends on the warrior's willpower attribute.
sentences.cn: 造成的危险值取决于战士的意志力属性.

sentences.en: This event tries the racers, skills, strength, and willpower.
sentences.cn: 这项比赛很考验选手的技术 、 力量和毅力.

sentences.en: This girl is distinguished from her classmates for her uncommon willpower.
sentences.cn: 这个女孩子有非凡的毅力使她不同于她的同班同学.

sentences.en: You are gradually losing your willpower and your ability to resist suggestions.
sentences.cn: 你渐渐的失去意识和拒绝暗示的能力.

words.tran_cn: 乐意的；自愿的；心甘情愿的
意志；情感；遗嘱；意图；心愿
决心；用意志力驱使；将（财产等）遗赠某人（will的现在分词）
决心要；遗赠；用意志力使

trans.tran_en: the ability to control your mind and body in order to achieve something that you want to do
